vsParam:
Marie,
we have collected the materials you wanted.

Oh, thanks!
Yeah, that's it, that's the one I want!

Ho ho...
I'll be able to make that thing with this!

Yes, that thing!
You'll know when I make it!

Uh, there's no evil smile...
But please be patient, you'll know when I make it!

*Boo-hoo*, I am worried... But I don't think
Marie would do make some strange stuff, will she...

I shall start my synthesis now.
It'll be done in a minute, please be patient!

Okay, done!
Come, guys! Drink it!

Errr, how can you make us drink it without saying anything...
What on earth is this thing?

Ah, sorry, I forget to introduce it.
This medicine is called "Bring smile to the world"!

It is a medicine of happiness which makes
people smile no matter who you are!

Oh, I see. Everyone will smile after drinking it, huh?
I really want Bergamot Sensei to drink it...

Ho ho, let's try it first.
I am drinking it... Glug.

Uh... I don't feel like smiling... Ho ho.
Ho ho ho ho... Ah ha-ha! Ah hahahaha!?

Ho ho... Ah hahaha!
Ah hahahahaha!

Why is everyone laughing crazily
instead of smiling!?

W, what's this... Ah hahahaha!
I can't, stop... laughing... Hee hee hee hee!

What, what's going on... Ah hahaha!
M, Marie... Ho ho ho ho!

Ah... Maybe the item's properties are changed
because I used materials in a different world?

Okay, I shall be more careful when using the same recipe.
A lesson learnt, let me note it down...

Ah hahahaha! This is not the time for you to take note...
Ho ho ho ho! Quickly... quickly fix us, ah hahahaha!
